name: Derek Sargent
text: Always clean and speedy service. And the staff is always pleasant and upbeat. Food is always good and hot and well prepared. Quality franchise in the chain. Love this place

name: Kevin Brown
text: They have good food there. The rolls are fresh food is fresh. The pricing is good. Never got bad food there .the help is friendly. Don't have to wait along time for food.

name: Angela Henderson
text: Awesome service. We were there Saturday, 3 sandwiches & a chicken Caesar salad. The lady taking orders was very cheerful and pleasant. The cook was quick and did a good job on our order. The Korean bbq was so good I finished it before â€¦More

text: These people, had the nerve to tell me that they couldn't make a grilled cheese sandwich, when all they had to do was grill a piece of bread and put cheese into it but they said they couldn't do that so, They're pretty much retarded. Now as â€¦More

name: Moe
text: The establishment as a whole. But the Hyde Park location is a waste. I went there this evening and waited 45min for two steak n cheese sub's. It should never take that long. There were customers that came in saw that there was a long line. â€¦More

name: Wiona
text: They did my sandwich wrong (gave me Italian instead of turkey and cheese),  didn't ask if i wanted the bread toasted,  and the people behind the counter were pushy. One lady touched her cell phone and talked on it while making the sandwich. â€¦More
